title: Akka Ketha Mappulla Lyrics Vettai
stanzas:
Thaiya thakka thakka
nee engirukka makka
Soala kaattu chokka
Ada kaathirukka akka(2)

yakka yakka thavalakka
yerikara meenakka
eppedi venum maappillai
eduthu viduren kelakka

pattam poochi kettuppo
thotta sinungi kettuppo
akka kuruvi kettuppo
pakka lista kettuppo

Ayyanaarathan Pola
romba periya meesaiyum venam
ambi paiyana pola
ada kambi meesaiyum venam

romba padichavan venam
school bencha theichavan venam
pencil bodiyum venam
mike tyson polavum venam

kaadhu chootil vervai vaziya
cellil pesi kenjanum
Marriage aana piragum kooda
charger oda suthanum

office pona enna
marakka koodathu
Veetil offeeca pathi
avan pesa koodathu

thozhil naan saayum pothu
thozhan pol mara vendum
thai pola enai thangum
aan vendum

Kattam kattama thaane
oru satta pottavan venam
katta mannu naan potta
adha thaandi poravan venaam

Shopping panna naan pona
billa paathu Morappavan venam
thoondil maattina meena
avan thumbil sikkanum thaana

sinna vayasu photo paarthu
enna kandu pidikkanum
enakku vantha kaadhal kaditham
senthu padichu kilikkanum

sandegap paarvai
avan paarkka koodathu
naan sandegama paartha
avan mirazha koodathu

enna paaratta venam
seeraatta venam
oru paarva
athu podhum eppodhum

seo.title: Akka Ketha Mappulla Lyrics Vettai
seo.description: Get the complete Akka Ketha Mappulla Lyrics Vettai from Vettai. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by Yuvan and sung by Harini. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Na Muthukumar, Vettai, Yuvan, Harini, Saindhavi, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
